verbose_text: Table XREF_TABLE and also show that pretreatment of cardiac myocytes with KB-R7943, a fairly specific inhibitor of the Na + / Ca 2+ exchanger in reverse mode [XREF_BIBR], abolished to a significant extent the Mg 2+ extrusion elicited by isoproterenol or phenylephine stimulation.
